findings.title: Integer Underflow on count Subtraction
findings.explanation: The `run` function subtracts a user-provided `input` from `count` without any checks. If `input` is greater than `count`, this will underflow, wrapping `count` to a very large value.
findings.fix_suggestion: Use SafeMath for subtraction or add a require(input <= count) check before performing the subtraction to prevent underflow.
